explains: n. 讨价还价；交易；交涉
v. 讨价还价；交易（bargain 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: plea bargaining n. [法]认罪求情协议
collective bargaining 劳资双方代表进行的谈判
bargaining chip 谈判的筹码；讨价还价的筹码

sentences.en: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement.
sentences.cn: 经过一番艰难的讨价还价，我们达成了协议。

sentences.en: The government has called for sensible pay bargaining.
sentences.cn: 政府已呼吁进行理性的工资谈判。

sentences.en: The release of prisoners was used as a bargaining chip.
sentences.cn: 释放战俘被用作讨价还价的筹码。
